channel.title: 网络 on Getone超

item.title: netcat：一款网络测试的瑞士军刀
item.description: 一、基本使用简介 usage: nc [-46CDdFhklNnrStUuvZz] [-I length] [-i interval] [-M ttl] [-m minttl] [-O length] [-P proxy_username] [-p source_port] [-q seconds] [-s source] [-T keyword] [-V rtable] [-W recvlimit] [-w timeout] [-X proxy_protocol] [-x proxy_address[:port]] [destination] [port] Command Summary: -4 Use IPv4 -6 Use IPv6 -b Allow broadcast -C Send CRLF as line-ending -D Enable the debug socket option -d Detach from stdin -F
